title: Shang-Wei LIN | Web Directory | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Dr. LIN Shang-Wei (林尚威) received his B.S. degree in Information Management from National Chung Cheng University in 2003 and received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Information Engineering from the National Chung Cheng University in 2010. In 2011, he was a postdoctoral research fellow in School of Computing, National University of Singapore (NUS). From 2012 to 2014, he was a research scientist at Temasek Laboratories in NUS. From December 2014 to April 2015, he was a postdoctoral research fellow in Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). From May 2015 to August 2024, he was an Assistant Professor in College of Computing & Data Science (CCDS) in Nanyang Technological University (NTU). He joined Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT) as Associate Professor on 19 August 2024.

text_lines: This question is for testing whether or not you are a human visitor and to prevent automated spam submissions.
Ph.D., Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering, National Chung Cheng University, Taiwan

Dr. LIN Shang-Wei (林尚威) received his B.S. degree in Information Management from National Chung Cheng University in 2003 and received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Information Engineering from the National Chung Cheng University in 2010. In 2011, he was a postdoctoral research fellow in School of Computing, National University of Singapore (NUS). From 2012 to 2014, he was a research scientist at Temasek Laboratories in NUS. From December 2014 to April 2015, he was a postdoctoral research fellow in Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). From May 2015 to August 2024, he was an Assistant Professor in College of Computing & Data Science (CCDS) in Nanyang Technological University (NTU). He joined Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT) as Associate Professor on 19 August 2024.
